title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 635-10.1 - Applicability

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 635-10.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Subpart
contains requirements and specifications relative to the provision of home and
community-based services (HCBS) waiver as authorized by the Secretary of the

United States Department of Health and Human services pursuant to section
1915(c) of the Social Security Act (see glossary). (b) All providers of home and community-based
waiver services shall be authorized pursuant to a Medicaid provider agreement
issued and approved by the New York State Department of Social services
specific to the type of services being offered. (c) In addition, all authorized HCBS waiver
providers shall comply with the requirements of Parts 624 and 633 of this

Title. (d) Also authorized pursuant
to the HCBS waiver referenced in subdivision (a) of this section, are community
residential habilitation services provided in OPWDD-certified community
residences pursuant to Part 671 of this Title. (e) The allowable activities for waiver
community residential habilitation services provided in accordance with Part
671 of this Title are not subject to the provisions of section
635-10.4
(b)(1)
of
this Subpart. Notes
